ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(7 of 12) Building Conversion Timeline") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(8 of 12) Kick Off Meeting") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(9 of 12) Client Training") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(10 of 12) First Payroll Run") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(12 of 12) Transfer to Ongoing Support") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(11 of 12) Post Run Debrief")
))))))
&& OR (
ISBLANK(Text ( Payx_PESE__c )))
